data: Photo courtesy of archivio fotografico della soprintendenza di Messina

Facsimile Images

[Θ(εοῖς)] · Κα(ταχθονίοις)
[---]γ̣νητος
ἔζησεν
ἔτη · μ´ ·

Apparatus criticus

Text after Zavettieri 2017 and photograph

English translation

To the shades of the underworld. [--]gnetos lived 40 years

Italian translation

Agli dei inferi. [--]gneto visse anni 40

commentary

The beginning of the name in line 2 is lost. The available names in [--]νητος are relatively few (LGPN lists some 17 different names ending in -νητος, of which several are either very rare or too long. The three most common, and the only ones attested in Sicily are Ἀφθόνητος, Διόγνητος, and Θεόγνητος, of which the latter two are more likely, since the trace visible on the photo before the ν is most readily compatible with a γ.

bibliography

  • Zavettieri 2017 169 no.4 fig.4 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001500
  • Bacci and Tigano 2001 89 CBI/5 fig.18 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002172
